item.title: Firebase vs Github vs Netlify vs Render vs Cloudflare
item.description: One of the early mistakes that we made as a startup was to use one system on one server for both web app and website. We thought that this would be sustainable, especially since we relied on mostly on interns and volunteers. Everyone would learn one framework and work on one repository and one branch. The mistake exposed itself when our server actually got website views and web app users. This overloaded our server causing it to either crash or incur charges when it auto-scaled to accomodate the traffic.
